articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.title: Watch the first trailer for Netflix’s Yasuke anime - The Verge
articles.description: Netflix released the first trailer for Yasuke, an upcoming anime series based on the legend of the first Black samurai, starring LaKeith Stanfield and with a soundtrack from Flying Lotus.
articles.content: The show will debut later this month
